languages.text: "Почему ты сваливаешь всю вину на провидца? Разве это не ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе так нуждался?"

traits.locale_text: "Почему ты сваливаешь всю вину на провидца? Разве это не ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе так нуждался?"

languages.text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"
languages.original_text: "Почему ты сваливаешь всю вину на провидца? Разве это не ты бросила Крударах, когда он в тебе так нуждался?"

traits.locale_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly with the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"
"Why are you placing the blame wholly with the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"
"Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"
"Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"
"Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

languages.text: «¿Por qué cargas al vidente con toda la culpa? ¿No fuiste tú quien abandonó Crudarach cuando más te necesitaban?».
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué cargas al vidente con toda la culpa? ¿No fuiste tú quien abandonó Crudarach cuando más te necesitaban?».

languages.text: 「なぜすべてを先見司の責任にするんだ？最も必要とされていた時にクルダラを見捨てたのはお前だったんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜすべてを先見司の責任にするんだ？最も必要とされていた時にクルダラを見捨てたのはお前だったんだろう？」

languages.text: “你为什么把责任全推到先知身上？克鲁达拉赫最需要你的时候，难道不是你抛弃了它吗？”
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么把责任全推到先知身上？克鲁达拉赫最需要你的时候，难道不是你抛弃了它吗？”

languages.text: « Pourquoi blâmer uniquement le Grand Prophète ? N'avez-vous pas vous-même abandonné Crudarach alors que vos semblables avaient besoin de vous ? »
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi blâmer uniquement le Grand Prophète ? N'avez-vous pas vous-même abandonné Crudarach alors que vos semblables avaient besoin de vous ? »

languages.text: "Warum gebt Ihr nur dem Runenpropheten die Schuld dafür? Schließlich wart Ihr es doch, die Crudarach im Stich ließ, als es Euch am meisten brauchte?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum gebt Ihr nur dem Runenpropheten die Schuld dafür? Schließlich wart Ihr es doch, die Crudarach im Stich ließ, als es Euch am meisten brauchte?"

languages.text: "Neden tüm suçu Ötesezen'e atıyorsun? Crudarach'ı en zor anında terk eden sen değil miydin?"
languages.original_text: "Why are you placing the blame wholly on the Farseer? Was it not you who abandoned Crudarach when it needed you most?"

traits.locale_text: "Neden tüm suçu Ötesezen'e atıyorsun? Crudarach'ı en çok ihtiyaç duyulduğu esnada terk eden sen değil miydin?"
